title: Online Education Program for Enhancing Female Mentor Competencies in STEM Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary education field experience and basic understanding of STEM disciplines
context.additional_context: Virtual peer mentoring training program for in-service elementary school teachers in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners acquire virtual mentoring tool usage to construct mentor-mentee interaction scenarios with 80%+ accuracy
Learners list three or more strategies to enhance female mentors' self-efficacy in STEM fields and apply them to real-world cases
Learners collaborate with peer mentors via online platforms to produce one verified mentoring guideline

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
